name: One Thousand Paper Cuts
description:
Welcome to One thousand Paper Cuts! A Hack 'n' Slash game where you rampantly destroy inanimate objects that have come to life, like yourself! Travel through different areas, and destroy your opponents with a variety of weapons, attacks, and environments! Join now for a discounted price while we're still in pre-beta phase, and earn yourself an exclusive sword in-game! Become the first Samurai to hone the way of the paper, and let forth a fury of stinging cuts on everyone's hands!

Join us on Discord!

https://discord.gg/BsXf2BS
